family.name: shipmentdetails
family.description: The shipmentdetails resource defines how and where the physical goods you're purchasing are shipped. The *where* you're shipping is the `shipping address`, while the *how* are the `shipping options` (i.e. Canada Post, FedEx, etc) available for your store.

uri-part.name: shipment-details-id
uri-part.description: A value representing the shipment detail identification.

uri-part.name: shipping-option-id
uri-part.description: A value representing the shipping option identification.

resource.name: shipping-option
resource.description: The shipping option that is currently selected for the order.

relationship.name: shipping-address-for-destination-info
relationship.description: Retrieve the shipping address that is currently selected for the order.

relationship.name: shipping-address-form-for-order
relationship.description: Create an address for an order.

relationship.name: shipping-option-info-for-shipping-option
relationship.description: Retrieve the shipping option that is currently selected for the order.

property.name: display-name
property.description: The localized name of the carrier, intended for display in the client application.

property.name: cost
property.description: The shipping costs for shipping the item(s) to the selected shipping address.
